body: Outline of template:  - Title (part of issue title) - Submitter (part of issue)      - Others (optional, if more than one person or an organization) - Who (As a...)     - Details (optional) - What (I need...)     - Details (optional) - Why (so I can...)     - Motivation          - Use Case or Use Case Category (at least one)               - allow for proposing a new Use Case Category or linking to a new Use Case proposal issue     - Details (optional)
